info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 21 at 10:12PM MST until August 22 at 12:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MOHAVE COUNTY... At 1012 PM MST, Heavy rainfall continues across Kingman and Golden Valley with flooding reported. Heaviest rainfall has occured in the Hualapai Mountains where numerous roads have been closed by flood waters. Additional flooding has occured in Golden Valley. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Kingman, Yucca, Wikieup, Wild Cow Campground, Hualapai Mountain Park, Dw Ranch Road, Blake Ranch Road, New Kingman-Butler, Golden Valley and Hualapai Peak. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
